TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: Kerbal Polar Expedition 3, day 2!

Articles.Content:
<figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="http://36.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_ntdzdjWBfb1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p><br/></p>

<iframe src="http://www.twitch.tv/hocgaming/embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="378" width="620"></iframe>

<p>The Kerbal Polar Polar Expedition is a yearly event organised by HOCgaming to support Charity: Water and fight to improve the conditions millions of people are living in.</p><p>From pole to pole, KPE3 will endeavour to drive a buggy approximately 1000km over the course of five days of livestreaming. Hosted by HOCgaming and with special guests and many YouTube and Twitch personalities, the “talkshow with explosions” returns!</p><p>You can support the campaign by donating <a href="https://my.charitywater.org/hocgaming/kerbal-polar-expedition-3"><b>here</b></a> to Charity: Water. 100% of every donation will go straight to funding a clean water project. Any amount you can spare is absolutely fantastic, and literally saves lives.</p><p>The second of five days of live streaming is live now!</p>
